name: Hatch Game - GGJ 2021
description:
Game made for the GGJ 2021 - Theme: Lost & Found

Hatch is a game where the player controls the blue turtle, who must explore the beach avoiding its predators, in order to try to lead as many siblings as possible to the sea, where they can find the Mother Turtle.

STORY

On a beautiful deserted beach, on the beach sands, a buried nest hides many little sea turtle's eggs. Mama Turtle laid the eggs very carefully so the lizards and the crabs wouldn't find them, and went back to the sea. Will you help the Blue Turtle, which has just been born, to discover how to avoid predators and help as many little siblings to cross the Great Sand and reach the Ocean?

CONTROLS

WASD to move

TEAM
